summary: An ordinance approving and confirming the assessment and assessment roll of Local Improvement District No. 4000 for the improvement of the alley in block 7, University Heights Addition, being the alley between Brooklyn Avenue and University Way, from East 47th Street to East 50th Street; by paving and otherwise improving the same, under Ordinance No. 48622, and levying and assessing the amounts thereof against the several lots, tracts, parcels of land and other property as shown on said roll, establishing a Local Improvement Fund.
